verses.verse: ( The Bronze Altar and Molten Sea) ( 110 7:23-26 ) וַיַּ֙עַשׂ֙ <WH6213> way·ya·‘aś He made מִזְבַּ֣ח <WH4196> miz·baḥ altar נְחֹ֔שֶׁת <WH5178> nə·ḥō·šeṯ a bronze עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <WH6242> ‘eś·rîm twenty אַמָּה֙ <WH520> ’am·māh cubits אָרְכּ֔וֹ <WH753> ’ā·rə·kōw long, וְעֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> wə·‘eś·rîm twenty אַמָּ֖ה <WH520> ’am·māh cubits רָחְבּ֑וֹ <WH7341> rā·ḥə·bōw wide, וְעֶ֥שֶׂר <WH6235> wə·‘e·śer and ten אַמּ֖וֹת <WH520> ’am·mō·wṯ cubits קוֹמָתֽוֹ׃ס <WH6967> qō·w·mā·ṯōw high. ( The altar was approximately 30 feet in length and width and 15 feet high (9.1 meters in length and width and 4.6 meters high).)

( The Sea was approximately 15 feet from rim to rim, 7.5 feet in height, and 45 feet in circumference (4.6 meters from rim to rim, 2.3 meters in height, and 13.7 meters in circumference).)

( The Ten Basins, Lampstands, and Tables) ( 110 7:38-39 ) וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <WH6213> way·ya·‘aś He also made כִּיּוֹרִים֮ <WH3595> kî·yō·w·rîm basins עֲשָׂרָה֒ <WH6235> ‘ă·śā·rāh ten וַ֠יִּתֵּן <WH5414> way·yit·tên and placed חֲמִשָּׁ֨ה <WH2568> ḥă·miš·šāh five מִיָּמִ֜ין <WH3225> mî·yā·mîn on the south side וַחֲמִשָּׁ֤ה <WH2568> wa·ḥă·miš·šāh and five מִשְּׂמֹאול֙ <WH8040> miś·śə·mō·wl on the north. לְרָחְצָ֣ה <WH7364> lə·rā·ḥə·ṣāh for washing בָהֶ֔ם Prep│3mp ( ḇā·hem) אֶת־ 853 DirObjM ( ’eṯ-) מַעֲשֵׂ֥ה 4639 N-msc ( ma·‘ă·śêh) The parts הָעוֹלָ֖ה 5930 Art│N-fs ( hā·‘ō·w·lāh) of the burnt offering יָדִ֣יחוּ 1740 V-Hifil-Imperf-3mp ( yā·ḏî·ḥū) were rinsed בָ֑ם Prep│3mp ( ḇām) in them, וְהַיָּ֕ם 3220 Conj-w, Art│N-ms ( wə·hay·yām) the Sea לְרָחְצָ֥ה 7364 Prep-l│V-Qal-Inf│3fs ( lə·rā·ḥə·ṣāh) for washing. לַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים 3548 Prep-l, Art│N-mp ( lak·kō·hă·nîm) but the priests [used] בּֽוֹ׃ס Prep│3ms ( bōw)
